Posts.Content: hello,i hae had stage 4 breast cancer that met to my right lung and liver.i sstill a,m in teatment thru the cancer center of americia and am doing very well on a clinical trial drg called sutant.i am 39 months into the program and am 63 years young and very active. my cancer has responded to the drug, seek advice and study . remmber that God is our healer and where there is breath there is hope. never give in or up,as i was told that maybe i had 3 months to get my affairs in order. check out there web sight and perhaps they can help. ctca,which stands for cacer center of americia.  sandy
Posts.Title: Seeking advice stage 4 running out of options
